Title: Successful navigation to Forgot Password screen
Preconditions: User is on the Login page at staging.finchoice.mobi/uat1/login
Steps:
1. Open the login page
2. Click on 'Forgot Password' link
Expected Result: Forgot Password screen is displayed with fields for Cell Number and ID Number

Title: Valid Cell Number and ID Number - Positive Flow
Preconditions: User is on the Forgot Password screen
Steps:
1. Enter Cell Number: 0631665248
2. Enter ID Number: 7703215554082
3. Click 'Next' button
Expected Result: User is navigated to the next screen (e.g. OTP/verification or password reset page) successfully

Title: Empty Cell Number field
Preconditions: User is on the Forgot Password screen
Steps:
1. Leave Cell Number field empty
2. Enter ID Number: 7703215554082
3. Click 'Next' button
Expected Result: Validation error displayed: 'Cell Number is required' or similar. User remains on the same screen.

Title: Empty ID Number field
Preconditions: User is on the Forgot Password screen
Steps:
1. Enter Cell Number: 0631665248
2. Leave ID Number field empty
3. Click 'Next' button
Expected Result: Validation error displayed: 'ID Number is required' or similar. User remains on same screen.

Title: Both fields empty
Preconditions: User is on the Forgot Password screen
Steps:
1. Leave both Cell Number and ID Number fields empty
2. Click 'Next' button
Expected Result: Validation errors shown for both fields. User remains on same screen.

Title: Invalid Cell Number format - alphabetic characters
Preconditions: User is on the Forgot Password screen
Steps:
1. Enter Cell Number: ABCDEFGHIJ
2. Enter ID Number: 7703215554082
3. Click 'Next' button
Expected Result: Validation error: 'Invalid cell number format'. User stays on same screen.

Title: Cell Number too short - less than 10 digits
Preconditions: User is on the Forgot Password screen
Steps:
1. Enter Cell Number: 063166
2. Enter ID Number: 7703215554082
3. Click 'Next' button
Expected Result: Validation error: 'Cell number must be 10 digits'. User stays on same screen.

Title: Cell Number too long - more than 10 digits
Preconditions: User is on the Forgot Password screen
Steps:
1. Enter Cell Number: 06316652489999
2. Enter ID Number: 7703215554082
3. Click 'Next' button
Expected Result: Validation error or field truncation to 10 digits. User should not proceed.

Title: Invalid ID Number - incorrect length
Preconditions: User is on the Forgot Password screen
Steps:
1. Enter Cell Number: 0631665248
2. Enter ID Number: 77032155 (too short)
3. Click 'Next' button
Expected Result: Validation error: 'ID Number must be 13 digits'. User stays on same screen.

Title: ID Number with alphabetic characters
Preconditions: User is on the Forgot Password screen
Steps:
1. Enter Cell Number: 0631665248
2. Enter ID Number: 770321ABCDE82
3. Click 'Next' button
Expected Result: Validation error: 'ID Number must contain digits only'. User stays on same screen.

Title: Valid Cell Number but unregistered - not linked to account
Preconditions: User is on the Forgot Password screen
Steps:
1. Enter a valid but unregistered Cell Number: 0700000000
2. Enter ID Number: 7703215554082
3. Click 'Next' button
Expected Result: Error message: 'No account found with this Cell Number and ID Number combination'. User remains on same screen.

Title: Correct Cell Number but mismatched ID Number
Preconditions: User is on the Forgot Password screen
Steps:
1. Enter Cell Number: 0631665248
2. Enter incorrect ID Number: 7703215554099
3. Click 'Next' button
Expected Result: Error message: 'Cell Number and ID Number do not match our records'. User stays on same screen.

Title: Cell Number with spaces
Preconditions: User is on the Forgot Password screen
Steps:
1. Enter Cell Number: 063 166 5248
2. Enter ID Number: 7703215554082
3. Click 'Next' button
Expected Result: System trims spaces and processes correctly OR shows validation error for invalid format.

Title: Cell Number with special characters - international format
Preconditions: User is on the Forgot Password screen
Steps:
1. Enter Cell Number: +27631665248
2. Enter ID Number: 7703215554082
3. Click 'Next' button
Expected Result: System accepts international format and processes OR validation error for invalid local format.

Title: ID Number with special characters
Preconditions: User is on the Forgot Password screen
Steps:
1. Enter Cell Number: 0631665248
2. Enter ID Number: 7703215-554082
3. Click 'Next' button
Expected Result: Validation error for invalid ID Number format. User stays on same screen.

Title: Next button disabled until both fields are filled
Preconditions: User is on the Forgot Password screen
Steps:
1. Observe state of Next button on page load
2. Fill only Cell Number
3. Observe Next button state
4. Fill ID Number
5. Observe Next button state
Expected Result: Next button is disabled when fields are empty and enabled only when both fields have valid input.

Title: Back navigation from Forgot Password screen
Preconditions: User is on the Forgot Password screen
Steps: 1. Click Back or Cancel button/link
Expected Result: User is redirected back to the Login screen without any errors.

Title: Page refresh clears input state
Preconditions: User has entered Cell Number and ID Number on Forgot Password screen
Steps:
1. Enter Cell Number: 0631665248
2. Enter ID Number: 7703215554082
3. Refresh the browser page
Expected Result: Fields are cleared on refresh for security. User must re-enter information.

Title: SQL injection in Cell Number field
Preconditions: User is on the Forgot Password screen
Steps:
1. Enter Cell Number: ' OR '1'='1
2. Enter ID Number: 7703215554082
3. Click 'Next' button
Expected Result: Input is sanitized. No SQL error exposed. Validation error shown or request rejected safely.

Title: XSS attempt in ID Number field
Preconditions: User is on the Forgot Password screen
Steps:
1. Enter Cell Number: 0631665248
2. Enter ID Number: <script>alert('XSS')</script>
3. Click 'Next' button
Expected Result: Input is sanitized. Script is not executed. Validation error shown.

Title: Next screen loads successfully after valid submission
Preconditions: Valid Cell (0631665248) and ID (7703215554082) entered
Steps:
1. Enter Cell Number: 0631665248
2. Enter ID Number: 7703215554082
3. Click Next
4. Observe the next screen
Expected Result: Next screen loads within acceptable time (under 3 seconds). Screen content is relevant to password reset (e.g. OTP entry).

Title: UI elements display correctly on mobile view
Preconditions: User accesses the page on a mobile device or emulator
Steps:
1. Open staging.finchoice.mobi/uat1/login on mobile
2. Click Forgot Password
3. Observe layout of fields and buttons
Expected Result: All UI elements (fields, labels, Next button) are responsive and properly laid out on mobile screen.

Title: Verify input masking for ID Number field
Preconditions: User is on the Forgot Password screen
Steps:
1. Click on ID Number field
2. Type any digits
3. Observe input display
Expected Result: ID Number is either masked (dots/asterisks) or visible as plain text consistent with design spec. No security risk.

Title: Multiple failed attempts - account lockout or rate limiting
Preconditions: User is on the Forgot Password screen
Steps:
1. Enter incorrect Cell Number and ID Number combinations 5 or more times consecutively
2. Observe system response after multiple failures
Expected Result: System applies rate limiting or temporary lockout after repeated failed attempts to prevent brute force attacks.
